---
title: "Bed Files"
execute:
  echo: false
---


## Bed File: HEME-STAMP-V1 {#Bed-HEME-STAMP-V1}

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

heme_stamp_v1_bed_data <- read.table("/workspaces/starr-oncology-data-lake-arpah/src/bed_files/Heme-STAMP_v1_APR2018.bed", 
                      sep="\t", 
                      header=FALSE,
                      col.names=c("chrom", "chromStart", "chromEnd", "name"))

DT::datatable(heme_stamp_v1_bed_data, options = list(pageLength = 25))

```
